Quote-Answer: You will throw a royal ball. Who will you invite as a guest of honor?
The merchant guild's chief. Even a ball can be a good oportunity for business.
The grand duke. Life as nobility is full of hardships, so we must help each other.
The captain of the guard. The man who defends our kingdom should be given a night of rest.
Some random commoner. You know, we need some new faces in the castle.
